product_name: ExOfficio Trail Roam'r Pants - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When you head out for your next hike, be sure to take the ExOfficio Trail Roam'r pants along. The comfortable fit with built-in stretch and trail-friendly features make and keep you a happy hiker. Durable fabric is blended with spandex for a comfortable amount of four-way stretch for great mobility while you're hiking. Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish to repel moisture and stains. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hand pockets, a welded-on zippered cargo pocket and a zippered rear pocket hold your wallet, keys and other trail necessities. Hidden zippered pocket inside the left hand pocket secures sensitive items. The men's ExOfficio Trail Roam'r pants have a natural fit. Closeout.
short_description: When you head out for your next hike, be sure to take the ExOfficio Trail Roam'r pants along. The comfortable fit with built-in stretch and trail-friendly features make and keep you a happy hiker.
